Title: 🖼 💪 DTEK is the leader of private investments in Ukraine during...
Description: 💪 DTEK is the leader of private investments in Ukraine during the great war. The publication NV published a rating of Ukrainian private companies that continue to invest in the Ukrainian economy during the full-scale invasion of the Russian Federation. The first step in this list is occupied by DTEK. We have already invested 41.2 billion hryvnias since the beginning of the great war. The main part of these funds is directed to the restoration of thermal power plants damaged by the enemy. We also continue to develop -green- energy to make Ukraine's energy system stronger. - Our strategic task is the construction of a new green generation that will increase the stability of the Ukrainian energy system, as well as the development of client services and the introduction of technological solutions to improve the quality of services for our clients, - noted the General Director of DTEK Maksym Timchenko. The battle for light continues. Let's stand and win!

Title: 🖼 Another crime of the Russian occupiers. The enemy attacked Kha...
Description: Another crime of the Russian occupiers. The enemy attacked Kharkiv. According to preliminary information, 44 people were injured. Seven of them are children, the youngest of them is three months old. Speedy recovery to all the injured. 🔴One of the energy facilities in the city also came under fire. We thank the rescuers who are currently eliminating the consequences of the attack.

Title: 🇷🇺🇲🇳 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin during hi...
Description: 🇷🇺🇲🇳 Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin during his visit to Mongolia▪️Putin invited Mongolian President Ukhnaagiin Khurelsukh to the BRICS summit. The Mongolian leader announced a positive response to Putin’s offer to take part in the meeting.▪️Putin said that Russia is one of Mongolia’s main foreign economic partners; in the first seven months of this year, trade turnover increased by more than 20%, commercial payments between countries are almost entirely carried out in alternative currencies to the euro and dollar. ▪️Relations with Mongolia are a priority for Russia, now the countries are faced with the task of diversifying them.▪️Russia is grateful to Mongolia for preserving historical memory, in particular about Soviet assistance at Khalkhin Gol.▪️Putin invited the President of Mongolia to Moscow to celebrate the 80th anniversary of the Victory, in Russia remembers and appreciates the assistance that Mongolia provided to the USSR during the Great Patriotic War.▪️Mongolian troops can take part in the May 9th Parade on Red Square.▪️Russia will increase quotas for Mongolian students by 620 places.#digest #Russia #Mongolia@rybar Support us
